meanings.definition: The quality or state of being patchy.
meanings.sent1: The patchiness of the quilt made it unique.
meanings.sent2: The patchiness of the lawn was due to uneven watering.
meanings.sent3: The patchiness of the paint job gave the room a quirky charm.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling had a patchiness to it, jumping from one topic to another.
meanings.sent5: The patchiness of the clouds created a beautiful sunset.

meanings.definition: The presence of patches or irregular areas.
meanings.sent1: The patchiness of the forest allowed sunlight to filter through.
meanings.sent2: The patchiness of the road made driving difficult.
meanings.sent3: The patchiness of the cat's fur made it look like a little patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent4: The patchiness of the crowd indicated that some sections were more crowded than others.
meanings.sent5: The patchiness of the map made navigation challenging.
